title: test translation
content: **chool** or taunting and touching in the market or on the bus. This is one girl’s story.* My name is Faith. I was on my way home from an errand one evening and I was just a few blocks from my house. Up ahead I could see a group of three teenage boys on the corner outside a bar. I knew they were trouble. I didn’t slow down. I didn’t want them to know I was scared. It was too late to turn around. So what I did was cross the street to avoid them. But they were watching me and waiting for me. They crossed the street and started to follow me. My heart was pounding.
